name: Blast Zone (Pixum)
description:
Blast Zone is a minimalistic, high-score arena shooter game where the you are in an enclosed environment. Waves of enemies continuously spawn, and it's up to you to shoot them down while collecting orbs to charge up the special laser ability. The game is fast-paced and progressively gets harder as you earns points by destroying enemies. With its simple yet challenging gameplay and focus on earning a high score, Blast Zone offers an intense and thrilling gaming experience.

Controls:
- WASD to move
- Space to dash
- LMB to shoot

Credits: 
Soundtrack by DavidKBD 
Additional help by Dylanweb

This game was made within three days as a personal game jam.
